titleStmt.title: To all that desire and breath after the Lord and the true knowledge of his everlasting way and the righteousness and peace of that kingdom which consisteth not in words, but in power, life, and joy in the Holy Ghost ... / written by Joseph Coale.
titleStmt.author: Coale, Joseph, d. 1670.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
